column2: an A.M. Eatery////We waited for about an hour and a half on a Saturday morning
column4: but we weren't too hungry yet
column5: so it was fine. They do have jenga
column6: hula hoop and other outdoor games to pass the time
column7: but it was just too damn hot outside. Food here was amazing!! I ordered the pancake flight and chose the blueberry danish
column8: pineapple upside down and bacon pancakes. They were some of the best I've ever had
column9: and they were small enough that I was able to finish the whole thing! The blueberry danish one was probably my favorite. I definitely want to come back to try the OMG! French Toast
